lines: munshee deenadayaal un aadamiyon mein se the jo seedhon ke saath seedhe hote hain par tedhon ke saath tedhe hee nahin shaitaan ho jaate hain
dayaanaath badasa munh kholate hajaaron kee baatacheet karate to deenadayaal unhen aisa chakama dete ki vah umrbhar yaad karate
dayaanaath kee sajjanata ne unhen vasheebhoot kar liya
unaka vichaar ek hajaar dene ka tha par ek hajaar teeke hee mein de aae
maanakee ne kaha jab teeke mein ek hajaar diya to itana hee ghar par bhee dena padega
aaega kahaan se deenadayaal chidhakar bole bhagavaan maalik hai
jab un logon ne udaarata dikhaee aur ladaka mujhe saump diya to main bhee dikha dena chaahata hoon ki ham bhee shareeph hain aur sheel ka mooly pahachaanate hain
agar unhonne hekadee jataee hotee to abhee unakee khabar leta
deenadayaal ek hajaar to de aae par dayaanaath ka bojh halka karane ke badale aur bhaaree kar diya
vah karj se koson bhaagate the
is shaadee mein unhonne miyaan kee jootee miyaan kee chaand vaalee neeti nibhaane kee thaanee thee par deenadayaal kee sahradayata ne unaka sanyam tod diya
ve saare teemataam naachtamaashe jinakee kalpana ka unhonne gala ghont diya tha vahee roop dhaaran karake unake saamane aa gae
bandha hua ghodaathaan se khul gaya use kaun rok sakata hai
dhoomadhaam se vivaah karane kee than gaee
pahale jode gahane ko unhonne gaun samajh rakha tha ab vahee sabase mukhy ho gaya
aisa chadhaava ho ki madave vaale dekhakar bhadak uthen
sabakee aankhen khul jaen
koee teen hajaar ka saamaan banava daala
sarraaph ko ek hajaar nagad mil gae ek hajaar ke lie ek saptaah ka vaada hua to usane koee aapatti na kee
socha do hajaar seedhe hue jaate hain paanchsaat sau roopaye rah jaenge vah kahaan jaate hain
vyaapaaree kee laagat nikal aatee hai to nagad ko tatkaal paane ke lie aagrah nahin karata
phir bhee chandrahaar kee kasar rah gaee
jadaoo chandrahaar ek hajaar se neeche achchha nahin mil sakata tha
dayaanaathaka jee to laharaaya ki lage haath use bhee le lo kisee ko naak sikodane kee jagah to na rahegee par jaageshvaree is par raajee na huee
baajee palat chukee thee
dayaanaath ne garm hokar kaha tumhen kya tum to ghar mein baithee rahogee
maut to meree hogee jab udhaar ke log naakabhaun sikodane lagenge
jaageshvaree doge kahaan se kuchh socha hai
dayaanaath kamsekam ek hajaar to vahaan mil hee jaenge
jaageshvaree khoon munh lag gaya kya
dayaanaath ne sharamaakar kaha nahinnahin magar aakhir vahaan bhee to kuchh milega
jaageshvaree vahaan milega to vahaan kharch bhee hoga
naam jode gahane se nahin hota daandakshina se hota hai
is tarah chandrahaar ka prastaav radd ho gaya
magar dayaanaath dikhaave aur numaish ko chaahe anaavashyak samajhen ramaanaath use paramaavashyak samajhata tha
baraat aise dhoom se jaanee chaahie ki gaanvbhar mein shor mach jaay
pahale doolhe ke lie paalakee ka vichaar tha
ramaanaath ne motar par jor diya
usake mitron ne isaka anumodan kiya prastaav sveekrt ho gaya
dayaanaath ekaantapriy jeev the na kisee se mitrata thee na kisee se meljol
ramaanaath milanasaar yuvak tha usake mitr hee is samay har ek kaam mein agrasar ho rahe the
ve jo kaam karate dil khol kar
aatishabaajiyaan banavaee to avval darje kee
naach theek kiya to avval darje ka baajegaaje bhee avval darje ke doyam ya soyam ka vahaan jikr hee na tha
dayaanaath usakee uchchhrnkhalata dekhakar chintit to ho jaate the par kuchh kah na sakate the
kya kahate
